author: Retro Game Corps
description:
I've been playing the Legion Go S (Z1E SteamOS model) a lot lately, so let's talk about my recent experience with it.

Buy one here: https://bestbuy.7tiv.net/2ayaY0
Initial review: https://youtu.be/Zwj7eP5yXY0

Correction: depending on the page I go to, Best Buy shows the Windows Z1E Legion Go S (white model) at $980 or $1030.  I'm not sure which one is the "official" price.

dbrand Killswitch case: https://dbrand.com/shop/killswitch/legion-go-s-cases
cheaper screen protector: https://amzn.to/4awovjq
